Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,WinVista,WinVista x64,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Added Dynamic Form Creation. Added all ODBC data sources, translators, and drivers. Fixed a few bugs too.

English.Keywords: database, create, ODBC, administration, relational, flat, file,chart,charting,data,field,administrator,sql
English.Char_Desc_45: Create and administrate any relational database.
English.Char_Desc_80: Create, administrate, and connect to any relational or flat file database.
English.Char_Desc_250: Create unlimited databases with unlimited tables, fields, and rows. Includes a custom report builder. Interface with ODBC compatible databases and create custom reports for them. When installing on Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 run as an administrator.
English.Char_Desc_450:
Create unlimited databases with unlimited tables, fields, and rows. Includes a custom report builder. Interface with ODBC compatible databases and create custom reports for them.
When installing on Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, set the application to run as an "Administrator" including the setup install file.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
SSuite MonoBase database with full 32 bit ODBC connectivity. Supports SQL to any connected database for administration, command execution, and table creation. Create your own personal and custom databases.
Create relational databases with unlimited tables, fields, and rows. Includes a custom report builder. Interface with ODBC compatible databases and create custom reports for them.
Features Available:
- Filter tables instantly - Ultra simple graphical-user-interface - Open up to 5 databases simultaneously - Export your data to comma separated files - Create custom reports for all your databases - Run SQL statements with the SQL query engine - Access any ODBC compatible database of any size - Print tables and queries straight from your data grid - Open up to 5 tables of the same database simultaneously - Full help file to assist you in creating custom database reports - Use MonoBase as an Interface to any ODBC compatible database - Create unlimited databases with unlimited tables, fields, and rows - Supports any SQL standard that your ODBC compatible database requires - Full administration capabilities of any ODBC compatible database through our SQL engine - Monobase includes the Paradox ODBC driver for complete compatibility for other database software
*** NEW UPDATES ***
- Dynamic Form creation - Export data in CSV or XML format - Master / Detail view on linked tables - Added 2D/3D charting on custom SQL Queries - Insert or paste Images with unlimited size for archiving - Enhanced data handling for edit/insert and viewing of data - Tables now have referential integrity with primary and secondary keys
Important: Right-click on the setup install file and select "Run as Administrator" { Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 and beyond... }
--- Set the executable "MonoBase.exe" to run as an administrator! ---
No Java or DotNet required, Green Energy Software! Saving the planet one bit at a time...
